original_query: SELECT MIN(ph.Id) FROM postHistory as ph, votes as v, users as u, badges as b WHERE u.Id = b.UserId AND u.Id = ph.UserId AND u.Id = v.UserId AND v.CreationDate<=CAST('2014-09-10 00:00:00' AS TIMESTAMP) AND u.DownVotes>=0 AND u.DownVotes<=3 AND u.UpVotes>=0 AND u.UpVotes<=71 AND b.Date>=CAST('2010-07-19 21:54:06' AS TIMESTAMP)
rewritten_query: CREATE VIEW E1 AS SELECT * FROM postHistory AS postHistory
CREATE VIEW E2 AS SELECT * FROM votes AS votes WHERE votes.CreationDate <= TIMESTAMP '2014-09-10 00:00:00'

CREATE VIEW E3 AS SELECT * FROM users AS users WHERE CAST(users.DownVotes AS INTEGER) >= 0 AND CAST(users.DownVotes AS INTEGER) <= 3 AND (CAST(users.UpVotes AS INTEGER) >= 0 AND CAST(users.UpVotes AS INTEGER) <= 71)
CREATE UNLOGGED TABLE E2E3 AS SELECT * FROM E2 WHERE EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM E3 WHERE E2.UserId=E3.Id)
CREATE VIEW E4 AS SELECT * FROM badges AS badges WHERE badges.Date >= TIMESTAMP '2010-07-19 21:54:06'
CREATE UNLOGGED TABLE E2E3E4 AS SELECT * FROM E2E3 WHERE EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM E4 WHERE E2E3.UserId=E4.UserId)
CREATE UNLOGGED TABLE E1E2E3E4 AS SELECT MIN(Id) AS EXPR$0 FROM E1 WHERE EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM E2E3E4 WHERE E1.UserId=E2E3E4.UserId)
